snippet: ETTUS--Sandra. After 45 years of friendship your sudden death has filled our hearts with sadness. We will always remember the fabulous trips and the best of times. We will miss you. Love, Laura and Sy 1/3
lead_paragraph: ETTUS--Sandra. After 45 years of friendship your sudden death has filled our hearts with sadness. We will always remember the fabulous trips and the best of times. We will miss you. Love, Laura and Sy 1/3
